public static android.net.Uri UpdateFromJson(@NonNull
                                                       android.content.Context context,
                                                       @NonNull

        Update/insert a conversion description into the GiiftProvider from its json description. The conversion id should not be null.
        Parameters:

        obj - json representation of the Conversion
        Returns:
